text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Six Two: When the thunderstorm comes, there is great danger; you may lose your wealth and have to ascend to the Nine Hills. Do not pursue it, after seven days, you will regain it.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二个 "SIX "被分割开来，当运动临近时，主体处于危险境地。他认为最好是放下（他所拥有的）物品，登上一个非常高的地方。他没有必要去追寻（他所放走的东西）；七天之后，他就会找到它们。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二个“六”，分开，显示了它的主题，当运动接近时，处于危险的位置。他认为最好放弃（他拥有的）物品，并登上一个很高的高度。他没有机会去追求（他已经放弃的东西）；七日之内，他必找到他们。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第二爻，六爻，动来之时，处于险境。决断放弃所持之物，登上极高之处。毋需追寻所弃之物，七日后自当找到。

text.ori_cn: 六三：震苏苏震行无眚。
text.man_en: The third SIX, divided, shows its subject distraught amid the startling movements going on. If those movements excite him to (right) action, there will be no mistake.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sixth three: Zhen Su Su Zhen line without cataract.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-three: Zhensu Suzhenxing Wuyi.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Six in the third place means: Repeated crashing. If one proceeds, there are no mistakes.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三个 "SIX "是 "分"，表现的是主人公在令人震惊的运动中心烦意乱。如果这些运动能激发他采取（正确的）行动，那就不会出错。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三部《六人组》，分裂，表现出其主题在令人震惊的运动中心烦意乱。如果这些动作激发他采取（正确的）行动，那就不会出错。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，震來虩虩，後笑言啞啞，吉.

text.ori_cn: 九四：震遂泥。
text.man_en: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject, amid the startling movements, supinely sinking (deeper) in the mud.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine-four: Zhen Sui Mud.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-four: Zhen Sui Mu.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Nine Four: Thunder penetrates the mud.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四幅九宫格，没有分割，画面上的主体在惊心动魄的动作中，仰面沉入泥中（更深）。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个“九”，完整地显示了它的主题，在令人震惊的运动中，仰卧地沉入泥浆中（更深）。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九四，震起却消沉于淤泥中。

text.ori_cn: 六五：震往来厉亿无丧有事。
text.man_en: The fifth SIX, divided, shows its subject going and coming amidst the startling movements (of the time), and always in peril; but perhaps he will not incur loss, and find business (which he can accomplish).
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sixty-five: the vibration of the exchange is severe, and there is no mourning.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-Five: Shocks come and go, nothing to worry about.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Six Five: Thunder comes and goes; there is no loss and there are things to be done.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第五个 "SIX "是 "分"，表现了主人公在（当时的）惊天动地的运动中来来去去，总是处于危险之中；但也许他不会遭受损失，而是找到了（他能完成的）事业。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五个“六”，分开，展示了它的主题在（当时的）令人震惊的运动中来来去去，并且总是处于危险之中；但也许他不会遭受损失，并找到生意（他可以完成）。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第五爻，分开，显示其主体在惊人的动荡中往返，总是处于危险之中；但也许他不会遭遇损失，并找到能够完成的事务。

text.ori_cn: 上六：震索索视矍矍征凶震不于其躬于其邻无咎婚媾有言。
text.man_en: The topmost SIX, divided, shows its subject, amidst the startling movements (of the time), in breathless dismay and looking round him with trembling apprehension. If he take action, there will be evil. If, while the startling movements have not reached his own person and his neighborhood, (he were to take precautions), there would be no error, though his relatives might (still) speak against him.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Previous Six: Zhen Suo Suo Sao Sao See Hale and Hale Signs of Failure Zhen not in its bow in its neighbor no blame marriage coitus with words.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chapter 6: The shocking thing is that looking at the hale and hearty and conquering the evil is not shocking. It bows to its neighbor and has no blame. There is something to say about the marriage.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Top Six: Trembling and shivering, glancing around in fear. Going forward brings misfortune. The tremor does not affect oneself but affects one's neighbors. No blame. In marriage alliances, there are words.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 最上面的 "六 "字被分割开来，画面上的主人公在（当时的）惊天动地的运动中，惊慌失措，战战兢兢地环顾四周。如果他采取行动，就会有灾难发生。如果在惊天动地的运动还没有波及到他本人和他的周围时，（他采取预防措施），就不会有错误，尽管他的亲戚可能（仍然）会说他的坏话。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 最上面的六人，分开，在（当时的）令人震惊的运动中展示了它的主题，在气喘吁吁的沮丧中，带着颤抖的忧虑环顾四周。如果他采取行动，就会有邪恶。如果这些令人震惊的举动还没有传到他本人和他的邻居那里（他要采取预防措施），那么就没有错误，尽管他的亲戚可能（仍然）反对他。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 上九，震索索，视矍矍，征凶，震不于其躬，于其邻，无咎，婚媾有言。

text.ori_cn: §艮：艮其背不获其身行其庭不见其人无咎。
text.man_en: When one's resting is like that of the back, and he loses all consciousness of self; when he walks in his courtyard, and does not see any (of the persons) in it, there will be no error.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Burgundy: Burgundy its back does not gain its body walks its court does not see its people no blame.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Gen: If Gen is not found on his back, his body is not found when he walks in his court, his person is not to blame.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Gen: Keeping still, he does not grasp his body. Walking in the courtyard, he does not see his people. No blame.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 当一个人静止的时候，就像背影一样，失去了自我意识；当他走在自己的院子里，看不到院子里的任何（人）的时候，就不会有错误了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 当一个人休息时就像背部一样，他就失去了所有的自我意识；当他走在他的院子里，没有看见任何人在里面时，不会有错误。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 当一个人休息时，像是靠在背上一样，完全丧失自我意识；当他在庭院中行走，而不看任何人，就不会犯错误。

text.ori_cn: 初六：艮其趾无咎利永贞。
text.man_en: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject keeping his toes at rest. There will be no error; but it will be advantageous for him to be persistently firm and correct.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: First six: Burgundy its toes without blame Li Yongzhen.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: On the sixth day of the lunar month: Gen’s toes will be free of faults and benefit forever.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First Six: Restraining the foot, no blame; it is beneficial to uphold lasting correctness.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一个 "SIX"（分割）表示主体保持脚尖不动。这不会出错，但对他来说，坚持不懈地保持坚定和正确是有好处的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前六张分开，显示主题保持脚趾休息。不会有错误；但坚持坚定和正确对他是有利的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，履趾，无咎，利永贞。

text.ori_cn: 六二：艮其腓不拯其随其心不快。
text.man_en: The second SIX, divided, shows its subject keeping the calves of his legs at rest. He cannot help (the subject of the line above) whom he follows, and is dissatisfied in his mind.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Six-two: Burgundy's fibre does not save its followers and its heart is not happy.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-two: If Gen Qifei does not save him, he will be unhappy.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Line Six of the Second Hexagram: When halting his feet, he does not restrain those who follow, making his heart restless.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二行的 "六 "字被分割开来，显示出被描绘者双腿的小腿处于休息状态。他无法帮助（上句的主人公）他所追随的人，心中感到不满。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二个“六”，分开，显示其主体保持小腿休息。他无法帮助他所追随的人（上行的主题），并且内心感到不满。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第二爻，六，表示其主体使小腿保持静止。他不能帮助（上面一爻的主体）他所追随的人，心中感到不满。

text.ori_cn: 九三：艮其限列其夤厉熏心。
text.man_en: The third NINE, undivided, shows its subject keeping his loins at rest, and separating the ribs (from the body below). The situation is perilous, and the heart glows with suppressed excitement.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Jiu San: Burgundy its limit columns its currying and smouldering heart.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-three: Gen Qi is limited to his strong and powerful heart.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Hexagram 53: Constraint in progress, represented by halting his feet. Advancing forward with danger and turmoil, troubling the heart.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三幅九宫格是不分割的，表现的是主体保持腰部休息，并将肋骨（从身体下方）分开。情况十分危险，心中抑制不住地激动。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三个九，未分割，显示其主题保持腰部休息，并将肋骨（与下面的身体）分开。情况险象环生，心中压抑着兴奋。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 三九，不变，显示其主体保持其腰部静止，肋骨（与下体分离）。形势危险，内心压抑着兴奋。

text.ori_cn: 六四：艮其身无咎。
text.man_en: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject keeping his trunk at rest. There will be no error.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: VI.4: Burgundy its body without blame.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-four: Gen’s body is not to blame.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Hexagram 64, Line 4: Restrain his body, no blame.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四个 "SIX"（分割）表示主体保持躯干静止。不会出错。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个“六”，分开，显示其主体保持其躯干静止。不会有错误。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第四爻，初六，分离，显示其主体保持稳定。不会有错误。

text.ori_cn: 六五：艮其辅言有序悔亡。
text.man_en: The fifth SIX, divided, shows its Subject keeping his jawbones at rest, so that his words are (all) orderly. Occasions for repentance will disappear.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sixty-five: Burgundy its auxiliary words orderly repentance death.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-five: Gen Qi's auxiliary words are orderly and regretful.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Six in the Fifth Place: Restraining his jaws, his words are orderly, and remorse disappears.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第五个 "SIX"（分割）表示主体的下颌骨保持静止，因此他的话（都）井然有序。悔改的机会将消失。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五个“六”，分开，显示其主体保持下颌骨休息，因此他的言语（全部）井然有序。悔改的机会将会消失。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第五爻，阴爻，象征其本体保持下巴不动，因此其言语井然有序。悔恨的机会将消失。

text.ori_cn: 上九：敦艮,吉。
text.man_en: The sixth NINE, undivided, shows its subject devotedly maintaining his restfulness. There will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Upper 9: Dungun, auspicious.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Upper nine: Dungen, auspicious.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Top Nine: Steadfast endurance, auspicious.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第六个 "九 "是不分割的，显示出其主体致力于保持安宁。会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第六个九，完整地表现了其主题致力于保持他的平静。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第六爻，初九，独立不改其静。吉。

text.ori_cn: §渐：女归吉利贞。
text.man_en: Kien suggests to us the marriage of a young lady, and the good fortune (attending it). There will be advantage in being firm and correct.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Gradual: the female returns to Gili Chastity.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Gradually: women return to auspiciousness and chastity.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Gradual Progress: The woman returns with auspicious integrity.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: Kien 向我们暗示了一位年轻女士的婚姻，以及（与之相关的）好运。坚定正确的态度会带来好处。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 基恩向我们建议一位年轻女士的婚姻，以及好运（参加它）。坚定、正确会有优势。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 乾建议我们一位年轻女士的婚姻和随之而来的好运。在坚定和正直上会有好处。

text.ori_cn: 初六：鸿渐于干小子厉有言无咎。
text.man_en: The first SIX, divided, shows the wild geese gradually approaching the shore. A young officer (in similar circumstances) will be in a position of danger, and be spoken against; but there will be no error.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: 初六：鸿渐于干小子厉有言无咎。
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixth day of the lunar month: Hongjian was very kind to Qian Xiaozi.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First Six: The wild geese gradually approach the shore, the young son faces adversity. There are words, but no fault.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一个 "SIX"，分割，显示大雁逐渐靠近海岸。一个年轻的军官（在类似的情况下）将处于危险的境地，会被人说三道四；但不会有错。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前六幅分开，显示大雁逐渐接近海岸。年轻军官（在类似情况下）将处于危险境地，并受到反对；但不会有错误。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，鸿渐于干。小子厉，有言，无咎。

text.ori_cn: 六二：鸿渐于磐饮食衎衎吉。
text.man_en: The second SIX, divided, shows the geese gradually approaching the large rocks, where they eat and drink joyfully and at ease. There will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: 六二：鸿渐于磐饮食衎衎吉。
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-two: Hongjian eats and drinks in Pan.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Line 62: The wild goose gradually approaches the large rock; there is joyousness in food and drink, which is auspicious.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二个 "SIX "被分割开来，大雁逐渐靠近大岩石，在那里欢快地吃喝，怡然自得。会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二幅“六”，分开，表现大雁逐渐接近大石头，在那里快乐而轻松地吃喝。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第二爻，爻辞：鸿渐于陆，饮食衎衎，吉.

text.ori_cn: 九三：鸿渐于陆夫征不复妇孕不育凶; 利御寇。
text.man_en: The third NINE, undivided, shows them gradually advanced to the dry plains. (It suggests also the idea of) a husband who goes on an expedition from which he does not return, and of a wife who is pregnant, but will not nourish her child. There will be evil. (The case symbolized) might be advantageous in resisting plunderers.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: 九三：鸿渐于陆夫征不复妇孕不育凶; 利御寇.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-three: Hongjian Yu Lu Fuzheng no longer pregnant women and infertility; benefit to resist the bandits.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Six Three: A large bird gradually lands on the ground. The man on a journey does not return, the woman becomes pregnant but does not give birth. Ominous; it is beneficial to resist bandits.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三个 "九 "是不分割的，表示他们逐渐向干涸的平原前进。(它还暗示了）丈夫远征不归，妻子怀孕不育。会有邪恶。(象征的情况）可能有利于抵抗掠夺者。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三个九，完整的，显示他们逐渐前进到干燥的平原。 （它也暗示了这样的想法）一个丈夫去远征却一去不复返，一个妻子怀孕了但不肯抚养她的孩子。会有邪恶。 （图中所示的情况）可能有利于抵抗掠夺者。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九三不变，象征逐步上升到干燥的平原上。（这也暗示了）丈夫远征不归，妻子怀孕却不会养育孩子。有凶险。（这种情况象征着）可能有利于抵抗掠夺者。

text.ori_cn: 六四：鸿渐于木或得其桷无咎。
text.man_en: The fourth SIX, divided, shows the geese gradually advanced to the trees. They may light on the flat branches. There will be no error.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: 六四：鸿渐于木或得其桷无咎。
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-four: Hongjian may be able to obtain the wood without any fault.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Hexagram 64: Gradually progress like a wild goose settling on a tree; if it finds a roof beam, there will be no misfortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四张 "SIX "被分割开来，显示大雁逐渐向树上移动。它们可以在平坦的树枝上打光。不会出错。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个“六”，分开，显示鹅逐渐向树上移动。它们可能会在平坦的树枝上发光。不会有错误。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第四爻，离位，显示大雁渐渐飞到树上。它们可能停在平坦的树枝上。不出错误。

text.ori_cn: 九五：鸿渐于陵妇三岁不孕终莫之胜吉。
text.man_en: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows the geese gradually advanced to the high mound. (It suggests the idea of) a wife who for three years does not become pregnant; but in the end the natural issue cannot be prevented. There will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine five: Hong gradual in Ling woman three years of infertility end Mo Zhisheng Ji.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-Fifth: Hongjian Yuling's wife was infertile at the age of three, and she finally lost her luck.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Position Nine Five: The phoenix spreads her wings, yet the woman does not conceive for three years. Ultimately, no one can subdue her. Auspicious.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第五行 "九 "字，没有分割，表现的是大雁逐渐飞向高高的土丘。(寓意）妻子三年不怀孕，但最终无法阻止自然分娩。会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五九，连绵不断，表现雁群渐进高丘。 （暗示）妻子三年没有怀孕；但最终无法避免自然问题。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九五，不妖，鸿渐于陵，其妻三年不孕，终莫之胜，吉。

text.ori_cn: 上九：鸿渐于陆其羽可用为仪吉。
text.man_en: The sixth NINE, undivided, shows the geese gradually advanced to the large heights (beyond). Their feathers can be used as ornaments. There will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Upper nine: Hong gradually in the land its feathers available for Yi Ji.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chapter 9: Hongjian can be used as auspicious instrument in Lu Qiyu.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Top Nine: The wild goose gradually reaches the land, and its feathers can be used for ceremonial purposes; auspicious.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第六个 "九 "是不分割的，表现的是大雁逐渐飞向高处（超越高处）。它们的羽毛可以用作装饰品。会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第六九，一体，表现雁群渐进至高处（超越）。它们的羽毛可以用作装饰品。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 上九，鸿渐于陆，其羽可用为仪，吉。

text.ori_cn: §归妹：征凶无攸利。
text.man_en: Kwei Mei indicates that (under the conditions which it denotes) action will be evil, and in no wise advantageous.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Returning to the younger sister: a sign of evil and irrelevance.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Guimei: There is no profit in conquering evil.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: FINALLY THE PRE you marr! Married away: an expedition is ominous and leads to no benefit.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 桂梅表示（在它所表示的条件下）行动将是邪恶的，无论如何都不会有好处。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 桂眉表明（在它所表示的条件下）行为将是邪恶的，并且没有任何好处。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 魁媚表示（在它所指的条件下）行为将是邪恶的，并且绝不会有利。

text.ori_cn: 初九：归妹以娣跛能履征吉。
text.man_en: The first NINE, undivided, shows the younger sister married off in a position ancillary to the real wife. (It suggests the idea of) a person lame on one leg who yet manages to tramp along. Going forward will be fortunate.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The first nine days of the year: the return of the younger sister to Di, who is lame and able to fulfil the levy, is auspicious.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninth day of the lunar month: Returning to my sister, I will be lucky because I am lame.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First Nine: The return of the younger sister as a companion, though limping yet able to proceed, brings good fortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一行 "九"，没有分割，表明妹妹嫁出去了，处于真正妻子的附属地位。 它暗示了这样一个概念：一个人瘸了一条腿，但仍能蹒跚而行。前进将是幸运的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前九部是完整的，显示了已婚的妹妹处于真正妻子的附属地位。 （它暗示了这样的想法）一个单腿跛行的人仍然能够行走。往前走会很幸运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初九，允兄之妻归于弟，辅于正位，以象一足而独行。前行吉。

text.ori_cn: 九二：眇能视利幽人之贞。
text.man_en: The second NINE, undivided, shows her blind of one eye, and yet able to see. There will be advantage in her maintaining the firm correctness of a solitary widow.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine-two: Gaze can see the chastity of a man of the world.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-two: The ability to see can benefit people's chastity.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ninety-two: The sighted one can see, the persevering person will uphold righteousness even in obscurity.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二个 "九 "是不分割的，表明她一只眼睛失明，但仍能看见。她保持孤寡老人的坚定正确性是有好处的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二个九，完整的，显示她一只眼睛失明，但仍能看见。她保持单身寡妇的坚定正确性是有好处的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，不恒其德，或承之羞。贞，吝.

text.ori_cn: 六三：归妹以须反归以娣。
text.man_en: The third SIX, divided, shows the younger sister who was to be married off in a mean position. She returns and accepts an ancillary position.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sixth three: return sister to Su and back to Ti.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-three: Return to sister and return to Yidi.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Hexagram 63: The marrying maiden returns as an inferior wife, reversing her position to that of a younger sister.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三个 SIX，"分"，显示了即将出嫁的妹妹处于卑微的地位。她回来后接受了一个辅助性的职位。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三个“六”，分开，显示了即将出嫁的妹妹，她的地位卑微。她回来并接受了一个辅助职位。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第三爻，阴位，显示了本应嫁出去的妹妹处于卑微之位。她返回，并接受了一个辅助的地位。

text.ori_cn: 九四：归妹愆期迟归有时。
text.man_en: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows the younger sister who is to be married off protracting the time. She may be late in being married, but the time will come.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine-four: The return of a sister is sometimes delayed.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: 94: Returning to my sister sometimes comes late.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ninety-four: When a woman marries late, though delayed, there will still be a time for her return.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四个 "九 "是不分割的，显示出即将出嫁的妹妹在拖延时间。她可能会迟些出嫁，但时机终会到来。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个九，未分割，显示了即将出嫁的妹妹正在拖延时间。她可能结婚较晚，但时机终会到来。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第四爻，九不变，象征将要嫁人的妹妹拖延时间。她可能会晚点结婚，但时机终会到来。

text.ori_cn: 六五：帝乙归妹其君之袂不如其娣之袂良月几望吉。
text.man_en: The fifth SIX, divided, reminds us of the marrying of the younger sister of (king) Tiyi, when the sleeves of her the princess were not equal to those of the (still) younger sister who accompanied her in an inferior capacity. (The case suggests the thought of) the moon almost full. There will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sixth five: Emperor B returns to his sister, his son's armour is not as good as his di's armour, and the moon is a few months away from being auspicious.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-Five: Emperor Yi returns to his sister's home, and the king's sleeves are not as good as those of his concubines. The good months are auspicious.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sixty-five: Di Yi marries off his younger sister. Her lord's sleeve is not as good as her sister's sleeve. The moon will reach its fullness around the fifteenth; this is auspicious.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第五个 "六 "是 "分"，这让我们想起了（国王）骐骥的妹妹出嫁时，公主的袖子与以低等身份陪伴她的（仍然）妹妹的袖子不相等。(这件事让人想到）月亮快圆了。会有好运气。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五个六，分开，让我们想起（国王）蒂伊的妹妹的结婚，当时她公主的袖子不等于以较低身份陪伴她的（仍然）妹妹的袖子。 （这个案例暗示了这样的想法）月亮快满了。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: （九五，阴柔）分配不均，提醒我们提伊王的小妹出嫁之时，公主的袖子不如陪她的更年轻妹妹。（这种情况让人想到）月亮将近圆满。会有好运。

text.ori_cn: 上六：女承筐无实士刲羊无血无攸利。
text.man_en: The sixth SIX, divided, shows the young lady bearing the basket, but without anything in it, and the gentleman slaughtering the sheep, but without blood flowing from it. There will be no advantage in any way.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The first six: a woman who cuts open and cleans a sheep and goat without blood is not a good idea.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chapter 6: A woman carrying a basket is not a real person. Sheeping a sheep has no blood and no profit.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Top six: A woman carries a basket with nothing in it. A man sacrifices a sheep without blood. There is no benefit.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第六个 "SIX "被分割开来，少女背着篮子，但篮子里没有任何东西；绅士正在宰羊，但羊身上没有血迹。这样做没有任何好处。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第六幅“六”，分开，画的是年轻女子提着篮子，但里面没有任何东西，而绅士正在宰杀羊，但篮子里没有流血。无论如何都不会有任何优势。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，象曰：女承筐无实，士刲羊无血，无攸利。

text.ori_cn: §丰：亨王假之勿忧宜日中。
text.man_en: Fang intimates progress and development. When a king has reached the point (which the name denotes) there is no occasion to be anxious (through fear of a change). Let him be as the sun at noon.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Fung: Hen King False Do not worry about the appropriate day in the middle of the day.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Feng: Don’t worry about King Heng’s holiday. It’s better to be in the middle of the day.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Abundance: Prosperity is granted by the king, do not worry; it is auspicious to act at noon.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 方意味着进步和发展。当一个国王达到了（这个名字所代表的）境界，就没有必要（因为害怕变化而）焦虑不安了。让他像正午的太阳一样。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 方暗示着进步和发展。当国王达到这一点（如其名称所示）时，就没有必要焦虑（因为担心发生变化）。让他像正午的太阳一样。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 放表示进步和发展。当一位国王达到那个点（名字所指示的点）时，没有必要因害怕变革而焦虑。让他如正午的太阳一样。

text.ori_cn: 初九：遇其配主虽旬无咎往有尚。
text.man_en: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject meeting with his mate. Though they are both of the same character, there will be no error. Advance will call forth approval.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: 初九：遇其配主雖然旬无咎往有尚。
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninth day of the lunar month: Even if you meet your match within ten days, there will be no fault and you will be fine.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First Nine: When encountering the right partner, even though it may take a ten-day cycle, there will be no misfortune; proceeding will bring esteem.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一幅九宫格，没有分割，表现的是主体与配偶的会面。虽然两人性格相同，但不会有任何差错。前进会带来赞许。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前九个完整的，展示了它的主题与他的伴侣的会面。虽然两者性质相同，但不会出错。提前将需要批准。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初九，不远复，无不利。趾之匪强，乃终吉。

text.ori_cn: 六二：丰其蔀日中见斗往得疑疾有孚发若吉。
text.man_en: The second SIX, divided, shows its subject surrounded by screens so large and thick that at midday he can see from them the constellation of the Bushes. If he go (and try to enlighten his ruler who is thus emblemed), he will make himself to be viewed with suspicion and dislike. Let him cherish his feeling of sincere devotion that he may thereby move (his ruler's mind), and there will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Six Two: Fung its cycle of 76 years in the day to see the bucket to get the doubt disease have Fu hair if auspicious.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-Two: If you see fighting in the middle of the day, you will get doubts and illnesses, and it will be auspicious for you to prosper.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Six Two: When abundance covers its screen at midday, one can see the constellation; proceeding leads to doubts, but there is sincerity. A sudden revelation brings good fortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二个 "SIX "是分隔的，显示其对象被又大又厚的屏风包围着，以至于在正午时分，他可以从屏风上看到布什星座。如果他去（试图启发被这样点缀的统治者），就会使自己受到怀疑和厌恶。让他珍惜自己真诚奉献的感情，从而打动（他的君主的心灵），这样就会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二个“六”，分开，展示了它的主题被大而厚的屏幕包围，以至于在中午他可以从屏幕上看到灌木丛的星座。如果他去（并试图启发他的统治者，他的统治者就是这样象征的），他将使自己受到怀疑和厌恶。怀其诚心，以动其心，则有福报。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第二阴爻，象征其人被如此巨大而厚实的屏障包围，以至于在正午时他可以从中看到轩辕星座。如果他去（并试图启发以此象征的他的君主），他会使自己被视为怀疑和厌恶的对象。让他珍惜自己真诚的奉献，这样他可以感动（君主的心），并且会有好运。

text.ori_cn: 九三：丰其沛日中见沫折其右肱无咎。
text.man_en: The third NINE, undivided, shows its subject with an (additional) screen of a large and thick banner, through which at midday he can see (the small) Mei star. (In the darkness) he breaks his right arm; but there will be no error.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Jiu San: Fung its pei day in the middle of the see foam folded its right arm without blame.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-three: If there is plenty of wealth, there will be foam in the day and the right arm will be broken. There is no fault.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Nine in the third place: He covers his abundance. At midday, he sees the froth and bends his right arm. No blame.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三个 "九 "是不分割的，它的主题有一个（额外的）大而厚的旗帜屏风，在正午时分，他可以透过这个屏风看到（小的）媚星。(在黑暗中）他折断了自己的右臂，但不会出错。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三个九，完整的，用一个（附加的）屏幕显示一个又大又厚的横幅，通过它在中午他可以看到（小）梅星。 （黑暗中）他折断了右臂；但不会有错误。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初九，阳爻，象征其主体（额外）的用巨大而厚重的屏风遮挡，中午时透过屏风只能看到微小的梅花星。（在黑暗中）他弄断了右臂；但不会有错误。

text.ori_cn: 九四：丰其蔀日中见斗遇其夷主吉。
text.man_en: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject' in a tent so large and thick that at midday he can see from it the constellation of the Bushel. But he meets with the subject of the (first) line, undivided like himself. There will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine-four: It is auspicious to see a bucket in the middle of the day in the middle of a cycle of 76 years when it meets its barbarians.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-four: It is auspicious to see a fight in the middle of the day and meet the barbarian master.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Position Nine Four: He gathers his cover, seeing the Dipper at midday. Meeting his respected leader brings good fortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四行 "九"，没有分割，显示其主体 "在一个又大又厚的帐篷里，正午时分，他可以从帐篷里看到布谢尔星座。但他遇到了（第一行）的主体，像他自己一样没有被分割。会有好运的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个九，完整的，在一个又大又厚的帐篷里展示了它的主题，以至于在中午他可以从帐篷里看到蒲式耳星座。但他遇到了（第一）行的主题，像他自己一样不可分割。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第四爻，九，不变，像是居住在巨大而厚重的帐篷中，中午时分依然能从帐篷内看到斗柄星。但他遇到了和他一样不变的初爻，吉祥。

text.ori_cn: 六五：来章有庆誉吉。
text.man_en: The fifth SIX, divided, shows its subject bringing around him the men of brilliant ability. There will be occasion for congratulation and praise. There will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: VI.5: The coming chapter has a good reputation for celebration and good fortune.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-five: The coming chapter is auspicious.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sixty-five: Future prospects bring celebration and good reputation.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第 5 个 "SIX"（分割）显示了主人公将才华横溢的人聚集在自己身边。会有祝贺和赞美的机会。会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五个“六”，分开，显示了其主题，将才华横溢的人聚集在他周围。会有祝贺和赞美的机会。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第五爻，阴爻，象征其主周围聚集了许多才智出众的人。有庆贺和赞美的机会，将会有好运。

text.ori_cn: 上六：丰其屋蔀其家窥其户阒其无人三岁不觌凶。
text.man_en: The topmost SIX, divided, shows its subject with his house made large, but only serving as a screen to his household. When he looks at his door, it is still, and there is nobody about it. For three years no one is to be seen. There will be evil.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Upper Sixth: The abundance of their houses and the shade of their homes and the peeping into their houses and the silence of their houses are not face to face in three years.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chapter 6: The house is full and the family is empty. There is no one in the house. The three-year-old is not afraid of the evil.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Top Six: Crowded are their roofs, shrouded are their homes; peeping into their doors, silent and deserted within, unseen for three years, ominous it is.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 最上面的 "SIX "被分割开来，画面上的主人公的房子很大，但只是他家的一道屏风。当他望向自家大门时，门外静悄悄的，一个人也没有。三年内，看不到任何人。这将是邪恶的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 最上面的六人分开，展示了他的房子变大的主题，但仅作为他家人的屏幕。当他看向自己的门时，门上静悄悄的，没有人。三年了，不见人影。会有邪恶。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 上九，分岔，象征房屋被扩大，但只是作为遮掩家庭的屏障。当他看他的门时，它是静止的，而门外没有人。三年内看不到任何人。将有祸患。

text.ori_cn: §旅：小亨旅贞吉。
text.man_en: Lu intimates that (in the condition which it denotes) there may be some little attainment and progress. If the stranger or traveler be firm and correct as he ought to be, there will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Brigade: small heng brigade ching ji.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Brigade: Xiaoheng’s Brigade is Zhenji.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Journey: Little Heng travels with good fortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 吕氏春秋》暗示，（在它所表示的情况下）可能会有一些小小的成就和进步。如果陌生人或旅行者坚定正确地对待他应该做的事，就会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 卢暗示（在它所表示的情况下）可能会有一些小小的成就和进步。如果陌生人或旅行者能够做到应有的坚定和正确，就会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 旅象征着在它所指的情境下，可能会有一些小的成就和进步。如果陌生人或旅行者能够坚定而正直地行事，就会有好的运势。

text.ori_cn: 初六：旅琐琐斯其所取灾。
text.man_en: The first SIX, divided, shows the stranger mean and meanly occupied. It is thus that he brings on himself (further) calamity.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: First six: the travelling Zozos which takes the disaster.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixth day of the lunar month: Traveling to Suosuosuo caused disaster.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First six: The traveler is overwhelmed by his own small concerns and meets with misfortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一个 "SIX "被分割开来，显示出陌生人的吝啬和卑微。正是这样，他给自己带来了（更多的）灾难。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前六个，分开，显示了陌生人的卑鄙和卑鄙的忙碌。正是这样，他给自己带来了（进一步的）灾难。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，旅琐琐，斯其所取灾也。

text.ori_cn: 六二：旅即次怀其资得童仆贞。
text.man_en: The second SIX, divided, shows the stranger, occupying his lodginghouse, carrying with him his means of livelihood, and provided with good and trusty servants.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: VI.2: The traveller is the one who gets chastity from the child.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-two: The traveler is pregnant with his qualifications and obtains virginity.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The second six: The traveler thus gathers his wealth and obtains loyal servants.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二个 "SIX "被分割开来，显示的是陌生人住进了自己的住所，带着他的谋生手段，并配备了贤良可靠的仆人。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二个“六”，分开，展示了陌生人，占据着他的宿舍，带着他的谋生手段，并配备了善良和值得信赖的仆人。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第二个六，分开了，显示陌生人占据他的寄宿房，带着他的生计，并配有可靠的好仆人。

text.ori_cn: 九三：旅焚其次丧其童仆贞厉。
text.man_en: The third NINE, undivided, shows the stranger, burning his lodginghouse, and having lost his servants. However firm and correct he (try to) be, he will be in peril.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine-three: the brigade burns its second and loses its children and servants to chastity.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-three: Lu was burned and his servant Zhenli was lost.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Nine in the third place: The traveler burns his hut and loses his servant. Perseverance brings danger.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三个 "九 "是不分割的，表现的是陌生人烧毁了自己的住所，失去了仆人。无论他（试图）多么坚定和正确，他都将处于危险之中。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三个九，完整地显示了陌生人，烧毁了他的宿舍，并失去了他的仆人。无论他（试图）多么坚定和正确，他都会陷入危险。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九三，无妄之灾，客人焚其馆舍，失其仆从，虽得正，其未可济。

text.ori_cn: 九四：旅于处得其资斧我心不快。
text.man_en: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows the traveler in a restingplace, having (also) the means of livelihood and the axe, (but still saying), 'I am not at ease in my mind. ”
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Ninety-four: I am not happy to be travelling in a place where I can get my money's worth.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-Four: I feel unhappy when I travel to various places to obtain my axe.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ninth Four: Traveling to a place, I receive provisions; my heart is not joyful.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四个 "九 "是不分割的，显示旅行者在一个休息的地方，（也）有生活资料和斧头，（但仍然说）'我心中不自在'。"
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个“九”，完整的，显示旅行者在一个休息的地方，（也）有谋生手段和斧子，（但仍然说），“我心里不舒服。” ”
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，不变之道，寓旅于栈，有资斧，我心不安。

text.ori_cn: 六五：射雉一矢亡终以誉命。
text.man_en: The fifth SIX, divided, shows its subject shooting a pheasant. He will lose his arrow, but in the end he will obtain praise and a (high) charge.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: VI.5: Shooting a pheasant with one vector and dying to end up with a reputable life.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-five: Shooting a pheasant and killing him with one arrow will end up honoring your life.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sixty-Five: Shooting a pheasant with one arrow; though it vanishes, it ultimately brings praise and honor.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第五个 "SIX "是分割的，表现的是主人公射一只野鸡。他将失去他的箭，但最终他将获得赞美和（高昂的）冲锋陷阵。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五幅《六》，分开，展示了它的主题射杀一只野鸡。他会失去他的箭，但最终他会获得赞扬和（高）指控。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第六爻，飞鸿破皂矢。虽失矢，终得其誉与高位。

text.ori_cn: 上九：鸟焚其巢旅人先笑后号咷丧牛于易凶。
text.man_en: The sixth NINE, undivided, suggests the idea of a bird burning its nest. The stranger, (thus represented), first laughs and then cries out. He has lost his ox (like docility) too readily and easily. There will be evil.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The first nine: the bird burns its nest, the traveller laughs first and then bawls, and the ox is lost in an accident.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chapter 9: The bird burns its nest, the traveler laughs first and then howls, and the cow mourns the disaster.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Top line: The bird burns its nest. The traveler laughs first, then cries loudly, losing the ox in the wild. Ominous.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第六个 "9 "是不分割的，寓意鸟儿焚巢。这个陌生人（如此表示）先是大笑，然后大叫。他太容易失去他的牛（就像温顺）了。会有邪恶。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第六个九，不可分割，暗示鸟儿烧巢的想法。陌生人（如此表示）先笑，然后哭。他太轻易地就失去了他的牛（比如温顺）。会有邪恶。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，未分割，象征着鸟烧毁它的巢。这个陌生人（因此表现出来）先是笑，然后大声喊。他太容易和随便地失去了他的牛（像温顺一样）。将会有灾祸。

text.ori_cn: §巽：小亨利有攸往利见大人。
text.man_en: Sun intimates that (under the conditions which it denotes) there will be some little attainment and progress. There will be advantage in movement onward in whatever direction. It will be advantageous (also) to see the great man.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sundance: Little Henry has the advantage of seeing the Lord.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Xun: Little Henry has a chance to meet an adult.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Xun: Little Henry went to see an important person.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 太阳暗示着（在它所代表的条件下）将会有一些小小的成就和进步。无论朝哪个方向前进，都会有好处。见到伟人也会有好处。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 太阳暗示（在它所表示的条件下）将会有一些小小的成就和进步。无论向哪个方向前进都会有优势。见到伟人也是有利的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 《噬嗑》暗示（在它预示的条件下）将会有一些小成就和进步。无论朝哪个方向前进都会有利。见到伟人也会有利。

text.ori_cn: 初六：进退利武人之贞。
text.man_en: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject (now) advancing, (now) receding. It would be advantageous for him to have the firm correctness of a brave soldier.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Chor 6: Advancement and retreat are beneficial to the chastity of a martial artist.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The sixth day of the lunar month: Advance and retreat benefit the chastity of the warrior.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First Yin: Advancing and retreating are auspicious for a warrior's integrity.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一个 "SIX"，被分割，显示其主体（现在）前进，（现在）后退。如果他能像一个勇敢的士兵那样坚定正确，那将对他大有裨益。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前六个，分开，显示其主题（现在）前进，（现在）后退。拥有勇敢战士的坚定正确性对他来说是有利的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，进退，利武人之贞。

text.ori_cn: §九二：巽在床下用史、巫纷若吉无咎。
text.man_en: The second NINE, undivided, shows the representative of Sun beneath a couch, and employing diviners and exorcists in a way bordering on confusion. There will be good fortune and no error.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine two: Sundance under the bed with history, witch strife if auspicious no blame.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-two: Xun used history under the bed, and there was no fault in the witchcraft.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Six in the second place: Penetrating under the bed. Using diviners and exorcists in great number. Good fortune; no blame.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二个九宫格，没有分割，显示太阳的代表在沙发下面，以一种近乎混乱的方式使用占卜师和驱魔师。会有好运，不会出错。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二个九，完整地显示了太阳的代表在沙发下，并以一种近乎混乱的方式使用占卜者和驱魔者。会有好运，不会有错误。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九二，见群龙在田，利见大人。

text.ori_cn: 九三：频巽吝。
text.man_en: The third NINE, undivided, shows its subject penetrating (only) by violent and repeated efforts. There will be occasion for regret.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine-three: Frequent Sundowner stints.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Jiu San: Frequent Xun stingy.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Nine in the third place means: Repeated humility brings regret.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三个 "九 "是不分割的，表明其主题（只有）通过猛烈和反复的努力才能穿透。会有后悔的时候。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三个《九》，完整的，显示了它的主题通过暴力和反复的努力而渗透（仅）。会有后悔的时候。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九三，重刚而艰。悔亡。

text.ori_cn: 六四：悔亡田获三品。
text.man_en: The fourth SIX, divided, shows all occasion for repentance (in its subject) passed away. He takes game for its threefold use in his hunting.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: VI.4: The field of repentance and death receives three pints.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-Four: Regret for Death and gain the third grade.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Hexagram 64, Line 4: Regret vanishes, fortune is achieved; threefold rewards.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四个 "SIX"（分割）表明（在其主题中）所有悔改的机会都已过去。他在狩猎中使用猎物的三重用途。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个六，分开，表明所有悔改的机会（在其主题中）都已过去。他捕猎猎物是为了在狩猎中发挥三重作用。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 六四，悔亡，田获三品。

text.ori_cn: 九五：贞吉悔亡无不利无初有终先庚三日后庚三日吉。
text.man_en: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows that with firm correctness there will be good fortune (to its subject). All occasion for repentance will disappear, and all his movements will be advantageous. There may have been no (good) beginning, but there will be a (good) end. Three days before making any changes, (let him give notice of them); and three days after, (let him reconsider them). There will (thus) be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine five: chastity auspicious repentance death without disadvantage without beginning and end first geng three days after geng three days auspicious.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-five: Zhenji, regret, death, no disadvantage, no beginning, no end, first three days of geng, then three days of geng, auspicious.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ninety-five: Persistence brings good fortune. No regrets, nothing unfavourable. From beginning to end, the auspicious period lasts three days before and three days after the geng day.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第五个 "九 "是不分割的，表明只要坚定正确，（其对象）就会有好运。所有悔改的理由都将消失，他的所有行动都将是有利的。也许没有（好的）开端，但会有（好的）结局。在做出任何改变前三天，（让他发出通知）；在做出任何改变后三天，（让他重新考虑）。这样）就会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五个九，不可分割，表明只要坚定正确，就会有好运（对其主题而言）。一切悔改的机会都会消失，他的一切举动都会有利。可能没有（好的）开始，但一定会有（好的）结局。进行任何更改前三天（让他通知）；三天后，（让他重新考虑）。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九五，贞吉。有孚，惠言。不咎。往有尚。无初有终。先庚三日，后庚三日，吉。

text.ori_cn: 上九：巽在床下丧其资斧贞凶。
text.man_en: The sixth NINE, undivided, shows the representative of penetration beneath a couch, and having lost the axe with which he executed his decisions. However firm and correct he may (try to) be, there will be evil.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Upper 9: Sundown under the bed to lose its capital and axe chastity.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chapter 9: Xun was mourning under the bed.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Top line: Prying under the bed, losing his ax and chisel. Persistence brings misfortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第六个 "九 "是不分割的，它代表了沙发下的穿透力，他失去了执行决策的斧头。无论他（试图）多么坚定和正确，都会有邪恶出现。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第六个“九”，完整的，显示了在沙发下渗透的代表，并且失去了他用来执行决定的斧头。无论他（试图）多么坚定和正确，都会有邪恶。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 上六，匿汗其辜，失斧肿，岿然其正，凶。

text.ori_cn: §兑：亨利贞。
text.man_en: Tui intimates that (under its conditions) there will be progress and attainment. (But) it will be advantageous to be firm and correct.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Tui: Henry Ching.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Versus: Henry Jane.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Joy: Propitious, divinatory decision.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 推》暗示（在其条件下）会有进步和成就。(但）坚定和正确的态度会带来好处。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: Tui 暗示（在其条件下）将会取得进步和成就。 （但是）坚定正确是有利的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 《随》象征顺应 (在其条件下) 会有进步与成就。 (但) 正确坚定是有利的。

text.ori_cn: 初九：和兑吉。
text.man_en: The first NINE, undivided, shows the pleasure of (inward) harmony. There will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The first nine: and Tui Ji.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The ninth day of the lunar month: Heduiji.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First Nine: Harmony and joy bring good fortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一个 "九 "是不分割的，表示（内在）和谐的愉悦。会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前九，不可分割，显示了（内在）和谐的乐趣。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初九，无咎，欢乐，吉。

text.ori_cn: 九二：孚兑吉悔亡。
text.man_en: The second NINE, undivided, shows the pleasure arising from (inward) sincerity. There will be good fortune. Occasion for repentance will disappear.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Ninety-two: Fu Tui Ji Repentance and Death.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-two: Fu Duiji regrets his death.

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二个 "NINE "是不分割的，显示了（内在）真诚所带来的快乐。会有好运。悔改的机会将消失。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二个“九”，不可分割，显示出（内在）真诚所产生的快乐。将会有好运。悔改的机会将会消失。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 六二﹕有孚乃悦，吉。悔亡。

text.ori_cn: 六三：来兑凶。
text.man_en: The third SIX, divided, shows its subject bringing round himself whatever can give pleasure. There will be evil.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: VI.3: Come to Tui Fierce.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-three: Come to redeem the bad luck.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Line Six of Hexagram 63: Coming to exchange brings misfortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三个 "SIX "是 "分"，它显示了主体将任何能给自己带来快乐的东西都带到了自己身边。会有邪恶。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三个“六”，分开，表明它的主题带来任何可以带来快乐的东西。会有邪恶。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第三爻，阴，象征其主体将自己环绕以带来愉悦的事物。有凶险。

text.ori_cn: 九四：商兑未宁介疾有喜。
text.man_en: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject deliberating about what to seek his pleasure in, and not at rest. He borders on what would be injurious, but there will be cause for joy.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine-four: Shang-Tu-wei-Ning-Xie's illness has a happy ending.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: 94: Shang Dui Wei Ning Jie Ji is happy.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ninety-four: Negotiations are not yet settled, but overcoming the obstacles will bring joy.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四个 "九 "是不分割的，表现了主人公在思考该从什么中寻找快乐，而不是安于现状。他徘徊于有害的事物之间，但仍有快乐的理由。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个九，完整的，表明它的主题正在思考要从什么中寻求他的乐趣，而不是休息。他的行为近乎有害，但还是值得高兴的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初九，不变，显示其主体在思考如何寻求乐趣，仍然不安。他接近可能有害的事物，但会有喜事临门。

text.ori_cn: 九五：孚于剥有厉。
text.man_en: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows its subject trusting in one who would injure him. The situation is perilous.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine and five: Vu in peeling there is a li.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-five: Fu is good at stripping.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: 59: To strip you of trust leads to danger.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第五个九宫格是不分割的，它显示了主体对一个会伤害他的人的信任。情况十分危险。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五个九，完整的，表明它的主题信任一个会伤害他的人。情况很危险。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九五，君子信人，凶。

text.ori_cn: 上六：引兑。
text.man_en: The topmost SIX, divided, shows the pleasure of its subject in leading and attracting others.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Upper Sixth: Citing Tui.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chapter 6: Quotation.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Top six: leads to satisfaction.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 最上面的 "SIX "被分割开来，显示出主体在引导和吸引他人时的愉悦心情。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 最上面的六个，分开，显示了其主题在领导和吸引他人方面的乐趣。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 上六，分象，说明其主体在领导和吸引他人方面的喜悦。

text.ori_cn: §涣：亨王假有庙利涉大川利贞。
text.man_en: Hwan intimates that (under its conditions) there will be progress and success. The king goes to his ancestral temple; and it will be advantageous to cross the great stream. It will be advantageous to be firm and correct.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Lax: Heng Wang false with a temple li wading in a big river li ching.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Huan: King Heng pretended to have temple benefits and crossed the Dachuan River to benefit Zhen.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Huan: Success. The king grants the temples; it is favorable to cross the great river and to remain steadfast.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 桓暗示（在其条件下）将会取得进步和成功。王上宗庙，利涉大川。坚定正确是有利的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 焕暗示（在其条件下）将会取得进步和成功。国王去他的宗庙；则有利于渡大流。坚定、正确是有利的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 恒象征着在其条件下会有进展和成功。国王祭拜祖庙，并且渡过大河会是有利的。坚持正固是有利的。

text.ori_cn: 初六：用拯马壮吉。
text.man_en: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject engaged in rescuing (from the impending evil) and having (the assistance of) a strong horse. There will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The sixth day of the sixth month: with life-saving Ma Zhuang Ji.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The sixth day of the lunar month: Use it to save the horse and bring good luck.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First Hexagram: It is auspicious to use a strong horse for rescue.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一个 "六 "字被分割开来，显示其主体正在（从即将到来的邪恶中）获救，并有（一匹健壮的马的帮助）。会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前六个，分开，显示其主题致力于拯救（从迫近的邪恶中）并拥有一匹强壮的马（的帮助）。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，象征其主体在救助（即将发生的灾难）并获得一匹强壮的马的帮助。将会有好运。

text.ori_cn: 九二：涣奔其机悔亡。
text.man_en: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject, amid the dispersion, hurrying to his contrivance (for security). All occasion for repentance will disappear.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Ninety-two: Lax runs its chance to repent and die.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-two: Huan rushed to his opportunity and regretted his death.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ninth second line: Dispersing toward the framework, regret vanishes.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二个 "九 "是不分割的，表明其主体在四散的人群中匆忙奔向他的设计（安全）。所有悔改的理由都将消失。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二个九，完整地显示了它的主题，在分散中，匆忙走向他的发明（为了安全）。所有悔改的机会都会消失。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九二，彖曰，困而速其趨，匪咎，淘失故也。

text.ori_cn: 六三：涣其躬无悔。
text.man_en: The third SIX, divided, shows its subject discarding any regard to his own person. There will be no occasion for repentance.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: VI.3: Lax its bow without remorse.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-three: Huan Qi has no regrets.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Line 63: Dispersion of oneself brings no regret.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三个 "六"，即 "分裂"，表明其主体摒弃了对自身的任何考虑。没有悔改的理由。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三个“六”，分裂，表明它的主题放弃了对他自己的任何尊重。不会有任何悔改的机会。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第六爻，动，象征舍弃了对自己的关注。不需要悔恨。

text.ori_cn: 六四：涣其群元吉涣有丘匪夷所思。
text.man_en: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject scattering the (different) parties (in the state); which leads to great good fortune. From the dispersion (he collects again good men standing out, a crowd) like a mound, which is what ordinary men would not have thought of.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Six four: lax its group Yuan Ji lax have mound unimaginable.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-Four: Huan Qiu Yuan Ji Huan Youqiu is incredible.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Hexagram 59: Dissolution leads to supreme success. Dissolution has a mound that is hard to fathom.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四个 "六 "是 "分"，表明其主体分散了（国家中的）不同党派；这导致了巨大的好运。从分散中（他又收集了站出来的好人，一群人）像一个土丘，这是普通人想不到的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个“六”，分裂，显示其主题分散（不同）政党（在国家）；这会带来巨大的好运。从像土堆一样的分散（他又聚集了突出的好人，一群人），这是一般人不会想到的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，分散，显示其主体在状态（不同）党派；这带来大吉。从散开中（他再次收集优秀之人，一群）像土堆，是普通人没想到的。

text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine four: no blame, not over the encounter of the past Li must be warned not to use the eternal chastity.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-Four: There is no blame. If you encounter someone, you must be careful and don’t use Yongzhen.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Six in the fourth place: No blame. If one does not meet the correct conditions, caution is necessary in any going forth. Permanently maintaining correctness is not advisable.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四个 "九 "是不分段的，表明它的主题没有陷入任何错误，而是（在其自然过程中）不超越（其境况的紧迫性），满足了（其境况的紧迫性）。如果他前进，就会有危险，他必须谨慎。没有必要永远保持坚定。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个九，不可分割，表明其主题没有陷入错误，而是满足（他处境的紧迫性），但没有超出（在他的自然过程中）。如果再往前走，就会有危险，必须要小心谨慎。没有必要永远保持坚定。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九四，无咎，弗过；遇之，往厉，必戒。勿用永贞。

text.ori_cn: 六五：密云不雨自我西郊公弋取彼在穴。
text.man_en: The fifth SIX, divided, (suggests the idea) of dense clouds, but no rain, coming from our borders in the west. It also (shows) the prince shooting his arrow, and taking the bird in a cave.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sixty-five: Dense clouds and no rain from my western suburb of Gong Yi to take him in the cave.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-Five: The clouds are thick and there is no rain. I sail to the western suburbs and pick him up at the hole.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sixty-five: Dense clouds without rain; I hunt in the western outskirts, capturing those in their burrows.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第五个 "SIX"，"分"，（暗示）浓云密布，但没有雨，从我们西边的边境飘来。还（表现）王子射箭，将鸟叼进山洞。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五个六，分开，（暗示这个想法）浓密的云层，但没有雨，来自我们西部的边界。它还（显示）王子射箭并将鸟带入山洞。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 上六，分，(象徵)密雲不雨，自我西郊。亦(象徵)王公射箭，中于巖雉。

text.ori_cn: 上六：弗遇过之飞鸟离之凶是谓灾眚。
text.man_en: The sixth SIX, divided, shows its subject not meeting (the exigency of his situation), and exceeding (his proper course). (It suggests the idea of) a bird flying far aloft. There will be evil. The case is what is called one of calamity and self produced injury.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: On the sixth: Fou meet over the birds away from the fierce is called the cataract of the disaster.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chapter 6: The bad luck of flying birds that you have never encountered before is called disaster.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Top line: Misfortune of encountering and surpassing a flying bird leads to parting and disaster. This is known as calamity.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第六个 "六"，"分"，表明它的主题不符合（他的处境的紧迫性），并且超出了（他的正确方向）。(让人联想到）远飞的鸟儿。会有邪恶。这种情况就是所谓的灾难和自我伤害。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第六六，分裂，表明其主体不满足（他的情况的紧急性），并且超过（他的正确做法）。 （它暗示了）一只鸟在高处飞翔的想法。会有邪恶。此案即所谓天灾人祸、自伤之一。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第六爻，分象，表示其人不应(其情势之急)，超过(其正道)。(象征)飞鸟高翔远处。必有凶。此所谓祸患自作自受之象。

text.ori_cn: §既济：亨小利贞初吉终乱。
text.man_en: Ki Chi intimates progress and success in small matters. There will be advantage in being firm and correct. There has been good fortune in the beginning; there may be disorder in the end.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: 既济：Heng 小利贞初吉终乱.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Jiji: Heng Xiaoli, Zhen, good luck in the beginning and chaos in the end.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ji Ji: Success comes with small advantages. At first, things are auspicious, but in the end, there is turmoil.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 淇淇（Ki Chi）意味着在小事上取得进展和成功。坚定正确的态度会带来好处。开始时会有好运，但最后可能会出现混乱。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: Ki Chi 暗示小事上的进步和成功。坚定、正确会有优势。初有福气；最后可能会出现混乱。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 既济象征着在小事上的进展和成功。坚持正道会有利。有一个好的开始；可能会在最后出现混乱。

text.ori_cn: 初九：曳其轮濡其尾无咎。
text.man_en: The first NINE, undivided, (shows its subject as a driver) who drags back his wheel, (or as a fox) which has wet his tail. There will be no error.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The first nine: drag its wheel to moisten its tail without blame.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninth day of the lunar month: There is no fault in dragging the wheel and moistening the tail.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First Nine: Dragging its wheels and wetting its tail, no blame.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一个 "九"，没有分割，（显示其主题为一个司机）拖着他的车轮往回走，（或者像一只狐狸）尾巴已经湿了。不会出错。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前九个，完整的，（显示其主题为司机）拖着他的车轮，（或作为一只狐狸）弄湿了他的尾巴。不会有错误。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初九，不远方来，复命，吉。

text.ori_cn: 六二：妇丧其茀勿逐七日得。
text.man_en: The second SIX, divided, (shows its subject as) a wife who has lost her (carriage) screen. There is no occasion to go in pursuit of it. In seven days she will find it.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Six two: the woman's loss of her 茀eyond the seven days to get.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-Two: When a woman loses her mother, do not wait for seven days to get it.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sixty-two: When a woman loses her hairpin, if she does not seek it, she will find it in seven days.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二个 "六"，"分"，（显示其主题是）一个失去了（马车）屏风的妻子。没有必要去寻找它。七天后，她就会找到。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二个“六”，分开，（显示其主题为）一位失去（马车）屏风的妻子。没有机会去追求它。七日之内，她就会找到它。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第二个六，分开，(显示其主题为)失去了(车)帘子的妻子。不必去追寻它。七天内她会找到它。

text.ori_cn: 九三：高宗伐鬼方三年克之小人勿用。
text.man_en: The third NINE, undivided, (suggests the case of) Kao Chung, who attacked the Demon region, but was three years in subduing it. Small men should not be employed (in such enterprises).
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine three: Gaozong cut the ghost side of the three-year grams of the villain do not use.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-three: Emperor Gaozong defeated ghosts in three years and defeated them. Do not use them on villains.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The third line: During the third year of High Emperor's campaign against the Gui Fang, he achieved victory; do not employ petty people.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三个 "九 "是不可分割的，"九 "指的是高宗，他攻打妖族地区，三年才将其征服。小人物不应受雇于（此类企业）。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三个九，一体，（暗示）高忠的情况，他袭击了恶魔地区，但花了三年时间才制服它。 （在这样的企业中）不应该雇用小个子。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九三：高宗伐鬼方，三年克之，小人勿用。

text.ori_cn: 六四：繻有衣袽终日戒。
text.man_en: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject with rags provided against any leak (in his boat), and on his guard all day long.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sixth four: Clothing with old rags is a constant preoccupation.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-four: If you have clothes, you should abstain from them all day long.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With his worn-out clothing, he remained cautious all day long.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四个 "SIX "是 "分"，显示的是主人公（在他的船上）为防止漏水而准备了破布，并整天保持警惕。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个六人分开，用破布（在他的船上）防止任何泄漏向其主题展示，并整天保持警惕。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第四爻，分裂，显示其主体用破布堵塞任何漏洞，并整天保持警惕。

text.ori_cn: 九五：东邻杀牛不如西邻之禴祭实受其福。
text.man_en: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows its subject (as) the neighbor in the east who slaughters an ox (for his sacrifice); but this is not equal to the (small) spring sacrifice of the neighbor in the west, whose sincerity receives the blessing.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine and a half: The killing of a cow by an eastern neighbour is not as good as the sacrifice of an ancestral sacrifice by a western neighbour.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: 95: The neighbor to the east who kills the cow is not as blessed as the neighbor to the west who sacrifices meat.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Book IX, Chapter V: The neighboring state to the east butchers cattle, whereas the neighboring state to the west performs simpler sacrifices and truly receives the blessings.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第五个 "九 "是不分割的，它的主体是东边的邻居，他宰了一头牛（作为他的祭品）；但这与西边邻居的（小）春祭是不一样的，西边邻居的真诚得到了祝福。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五个“九”，完整地显示了它的主题（如）东方的邻居宰杀了一头牛（作为他的牺牲）；但这不及西边邻国的春祭，其诚意得到了祝福。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九五，不易，象征东方邻居用牛作祭品；但不如西方邻居的小春祭，其诚心收获祝福。

text.ori_cn: 上六：濡其首厉。
text.man_en: The topmost SIX, divided, shows its subject with (even) his head immersed. The position is perilous.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Upper Sixth: moistening its head and straining it.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Shang 6: Moisturize his head.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Top Six: He soaks his head; this is perilous.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 最上方的 "SIX "被分割开来，显示主体（甚至）头部浸入水中。这个位置非常危险。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 最上面的六个，分开，展示了它的主题（甚至）他的头浸入水中。处境危险。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 上九，亢龙有悔。其势危矣。

text.ori_cn: §未济：亨小狐汔济濡其尾无攸利。
text.man_en: Wei Chi intimates progress and success (in the circumstances which it implies). (We see) a young fox that has nearly crossed (the stream), when its tail gets immersed. There will be no advantage in any way.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Wei Ji: Heng small fox car with Ji moisten its tail is not relevant.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Weiji: The little fox is prosperous and its tail is not profitable.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Wei Ji: Success for the small fox, barely crossing the ford but wetting its tail—there is no benefit.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 韦编三绝》暗示着进步和成功（在它所暗示的情况下）。(我们看到）一只小狐狸快越过（溪流）时，尾巴被浸没了。在任何方面都不会有好处。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 围棋暗示着进步和成功（在它所暗示的情况下）。 （我们看到）一只年轻的狐狸快要穿过（小溪）时，它的尾巴被浸没了。无论如何都不会有任何优势。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 未济象征着前进和成功（在预示的情况下）。（我们看到）一只年轻的狐狸快要渡过溪流，但它的尾巴被浸湿。将没有任何益处。

text.ori_cn: 初六：濡其尾吝。
text.man_en: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject (like a fox) whose tail gets immersed. There will be occasion for regret.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: First six: moisten its tail stint.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The sixth day of the lunar month: Moisten the tail.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First Hexagram Line: Dampening its tail brings adversity.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一个 "SIX "被分割开来，显示其主体（像一只狐狸）的尾巴被浸入水中。会有后悔的时候。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前六幅被分开，展示了它的主题（像一只狐狸），尾巴被浸入水中。会有后悔的时候。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 初六，分裂，象狐狸一样，其尾巴被浸湿了。会有悔恨之情。

text.ori_cn: 九二：曳其轮贞吉。
text.man_en: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject dragging back his (carriage) wheel. With firmness and correctness there will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine-two: Towards the chastity and good fortune of its wheels.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-two: Pulling the wheel is auspicious.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Nine in the second place: Pulling at a halted wheel, perseverance brings good fortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第二个 "九 "是不分割的，表示主体拖着他的（马车）轮子往回走。有了坚定和正确，就会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第二个“九”是完整的，显示其主体拖着他的（马车）轮子。只要坚定正确，就会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 六二﹕直其𨱋，貞吉。

text.ori_cn: 六三：未济征凶利涉大川。
text.man_en: The third SIX, divided, shows its subject, with (the state of things) not yet remedied, advancing on; which will lead to evil. But there will be advantage in (trying to) cross the great stream.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sixth three: Wei Ji levies the evil and benefits from crossing the great river.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-three: Unlucky and unlucky, the river will be crossed.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Nine in the third place: Troubles lie ahead, but it is advantageous to cross the great river.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第三个 "六"，"分"，表明其主题，（事态）尚未得到补救，仍在发展；这将导致邪恶。但（尝试）跨越大河会有好处。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第三个六，分开，表明其主体，尚未补救，继续前进；这将导致邪恶。但（试图）渡过大溪会有好处。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第三条阴爻，分裂，表示其主体，在事情尚未得到解决的情况下，继续前行；这将导致灾祸。但尝试渡过大河会有利。

text.ori_cn: 九四：贞吉悔亡震用伐鬼方三年有赏于大国。
text.man_en: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject by firm correctness obtaining good fortune, so that all occasion for repentance disappears. Let him stir himself up, as if he were invading the Demon region, where for three years rewards will come to him (and his troops) from the great kingdom.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nine Four: Ching Ji Repentance Death Zhen with the use of cutting ghosts Fang three years have a reward in the big country.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ninety-Four: Zhenji regretted his death and used it to defeat ghosts. After three years, he was rewarded by a great country.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Six Four: Upright and auspicious. Regret vanishes. The thunderous energy successfully subdues the ghostly adversaries. In three years, there will be rewards from a great nation.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第四个 "九 "是不分割的，它以坚定的正确性显示其主题，从而获得好运，使所有悔恨的理由消失。让他鼓起勇气，就像他正在攻打恶魔地区一样，在那里的三年里，他（和他的军队）将得到来自伟大王国的奖赏。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第四个九，不可分割，以坚定的正确性获得好运来显示其主题，以便所有悔改的机会消失。让他振作起来，就好像他正在入侵魔域一样，三年之内，他（和他的军队）将从伟大的王国那里获得奖励。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 九四，贞吉，悔亡。震用伐鬼方，三年有赏于大国。

text.ori_cn: 六五：贞吉无悔君子之光有孚吉。
text.man_en: The fifth SIX, divided, shows its subject by firm correctness obtaining good fortune, and having no occasion for repentance. (We see in him) the brightness of a superior man, and the possession of sincerity. There will be good fortune.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sixth five: chaste and auspicious without remorseful gentleman's light has fu auspicious.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sixty-five: Chastity and no regrets, the light of a gentleman is good fortune.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Position Six Five: Persistence brings good fortune and no regret. The virtue of a gentleman shines and confidence assures success.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第五个 "六"，"分"，显示其主题是坚定正确，获得好运，无须悔改。(我们在他身上看到了）高人的光辉，拥有真诚。会有好运。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第五六分，以坚定正确获得好运，无悔的机会来表明其主题。 （在他身上看到）君子的光辉，以及真诚的拥有。将会有好运。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 第六五，分裂，显示其主体通过坚定正确获得吉祥，无需悔恨。（我们看到他）表现出君子的光辉，并且诚心拥有。会有好运。

text.ori_cn: 上九：有孚于饮酒无咎濡其首有孚失是。§
text.man_en: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows its subject full of confidence and therefore feasting (quietly). There will be no error. (If he) cherish this confidence, till he (is like the fox who) gets his head immersed, it will fail of what is right.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Upper nine: there is no blame for moistening the first of its first Fu lost is.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chapter 9: If you are good at drinking alcohol, you will not blame others for your mistakes.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sixth Nine: Having faith while drinking wine leads to no blame; wetting one's head signifies losing that faith.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 最上面的 "九"，没有分割，显示出主体充满自信，因此（安静地）大快朵颐。不会出错。(如果他）怀有这种信心，直到他（像狐狸一样）把头浸入水中，它就会不做正确的事。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 最上面的九个，完整的，显示了它的主题充满自信，因此（安静地）享受盛宴。不会有错误。珍惜这份信心，直到他（如狐狸）把头浸入水中，才不会做正事。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 上九，无咎，自信宴（静）焉。无咎。若保此自信，如狐入首，则失之正。
